getNextID

public long getNextID(java.lang.String idName)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                      IDGenerationException
Returns the next ID in the named ID sequence.

Parameters:
idName - the name of the ID sequence
Returns:
the next ID in the named ID sequence
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if an RMI error occurs between client and EJB container
IDGenerationException - if an error occurs while generating the ID (for example, error while connecting to the database)

getNextBigID

public java.math.BigInteger getNextBigID(java.lang.String idName)
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                         IDGenerationException

Returns the next BigInteger ID in the named ID sequence.

Parameters:
idName - the name of the ID sequence
Returns:
next value that would be returned by getNextID() as a BigInteger
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if an RMI error occurs between client and EJB container
IDGenerationException - if an error occurs while generating the ID (for example, error while connecting to the database)
